title: Thom Evans leaves nightclub with mystery girl after X Factor: Celebrity appearance
text:
He impressed viewers with his appearance on The X Factor: Celebrity on Saturday night, as part of sportsman supergroup Try Star alongside Ben Foden and Levi Davis.

And Thom Evans was celebrating his successful first performance on the TV show by enjoying a night out at Tape nightclub in London on Saturday.

The star, 34, was spotted leaving the celebrity hotspot alongside a pretty brunette companion in the early hours of Sunday morning.

Celebrating: Thom Evans was celebrating his successful first performance on The X Factor: Celebrity by enjoying a night out at Tape nightclub in London on Saturday

Thom was casually clad in a grey T-shirt and jeans, layering up with a stripe detail bomber jacket.

The handsome former rugby player flashed a coy smile as he headed off home, toasting the positive reaction from fans.

And it wasn't just viewers at home swooning over the sportsmen since the boys have landed themselves an admirer in judge Nicole Scherzinger, who has taken a particular shine to Ben Foden.

Good night: The star, 34, was spotted leaving the celebrity hotspot alongside a pretty brunette companion in the early hours of Sunday morning

Swooning: it wasn't just viewers at home swooning over the sportsmen since the boys have landed themselves an admirer in judge Nicole Scherzinger (left), who has taken a particular shine to Ben Foden (right)

The former Pussycat Doll, 41, couldn't resist drawing attention to how his shirt hung 'openly and freely on his chest.'

She told him: 'I'm excited about your shirt right now, Ben how it just hangs just freely and openly on your chesticles.'

Ahead of Try Star's impressive performance to Blackstreet's No Diggity, Nicole was heard mentioning: 'These guys are hot, I'm newly single and ready to mingle.'

Stars: Ben took the stage with his group Try Star alongside Thom and Levi Davis

'Chesticles': However, the former Pussycat Doll, 41, couldn't resist drawing attention to how his shirt hung 'openly and freely on his chest'

She then told a disapproving Simon, 'I'm kidding', to which he quipped back: 'No more sports stars babe' - no doubt, referencing Nicole's romance with Lewis Hamilton.

Ahead of their debut appearance on the reality show, Thom revealed how excited he was about the opportunity.

He said: 'It’s been amazing fun so far. I’ve known Ben for a long time and it’s funny, we used to go to rugby camps when we were kids and we’d always be singing in the back of the car.

'Actually, the singing culture in rugby is quite a big thing.'
description: Thom Evans was celebrating his successful first performance on The X Factor: Celebrity by enjoying a night out at Tape nightclub in London on Saturday.
